des:
This skill provides Alexa Smart Home integration with a popular home automation software called Home Assistant.
Using this skill you can read sensor information, control power sockets and switches, trigger scripts, enable/disable HA automations and more.

Please follow the set up instructions before enabling this skill: https://www.easeit.cz/home-assistant-gateway-configuration/
